artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Collins & Aikman; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Unidentified but possibly PanAm fabric in various weaves, blue & brown. Nos. 6 - 13 are more boldly woven patterns in plain & plaid. Double weave. Two Color variations (blue & brown) woven together, each 27.25" wide. One inch plaid squares surrounded by 2.25" solid bands. (Smoke blue - square)
dimension: overall (Machine overcast on bottom.): 13 1/2 x 55 1/2 in. (34.29 x 140.97 cm)
